properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA.
DNC 14.
F/V LUCKY STAR, BLUE HULL, THREE PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO
ENGINE FAILURE MARIGOT BAY (13-57.83N 061-01.56W)
TO VIEUX FORT (13-45.00N 060-57.00W). LAST KNOWN
POSITION IN VICINITY 13-33.41N 061-04.73W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT,  ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
